short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-driven alternative to native bookmarks and reading lists, with support for topic classification and content summarization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-driven Chrome extension that can replace native bookmarks and reading list, and it also supports topic classification and content summarization.
